    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        double sum = 0;
        double price;
        double qty;
        double cal = 0;
        
         if(cb1.isSelected())
        {
           String suger = cb1.getText();
           String mes= combo1.getSelectedItem().toString();
            price = 140.0;
            qty = Integer.parseInt(stf.getText());
            
             if(mes.equals("KG"))
          {
                cal = (qty * price) ; 
                model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();
                model.addRow(new Object[]
                {   
                suger,
                 price,
                 qty,
                 cal
                });  
          }
             else
             {
              cal = (qty/1000 * price) ; 

              model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();
            
            model.addRow(new Object[]
            {
            
            suger,
             price,
             qty,
             cal
            });        
             }
         if(cb2.isSelected())
        {
            String tea = cb2.getText();
           String mes1= combo2.getSelectedItem().toString();
            price = 200.0;
            qty = Integer.parseInt(ttf.getText());
            
             if(mes1.equals("KG"))
          {
               cal = (qty * price) ; 
               model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();
               model.addRow(new Object[]
                {   
                tea,
                 price,
                 qty,
                 cal
                });  
          }
             else
             {
              cal = (qty/1000 * price) ; 

              model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();          
              model.addRow(new Object[]
            {
            
             tea,
             price,
             qty,
             cal
            });        
             }
            
        } 
            if(cb3.isSelected())
        {
            String flour = cb3.getText();
           String mes2= combo3.getSelectedItem().toString();
            price = 250.0;
            qty = Integer.parseInt(ftf.getText());
            
             if(mes2.equals("KG"))
          {
               cal = (qty * price) ; 
               model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();
               model.addRow(new Object[]
                {   
                flour,
                 price,
                 qty,
                 cal
                });  
          }
             else
             {
              cal = (qty/1000 * price) ; 
              txtbill.setText(String.valueOf(cal));
              model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();          
              model.addRow(new Object[]
            {
            
             flour,
             price,
             qty,
             cal
            });        
             }
            
        } 
           if(cb4.isSelected())
        {
            String rice = cb4.getText();
           String mes3= combo4.getSelectedItem().toString();
            price = 250.0;
            qty = Integer.parseInt(rtf.getText());
            
             if(mes3.equals("KG"))
          {
               cal = (qty * price) ; 
               model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();
               model.addRow(new Object[]
                {   
                rice,
                 price,
                 qty,
                 cal
                });  
          }
             else
             {
              cal = (qty/1000 * price) ; 

              model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();          
              model.addRow(new Object[]
            {
            
             rice,
             price,
             qty,
             cal
            });        
             }
            
        } 
          if(cb5.isSelected())
        {
            String dhall = cb5.getText();
           String mes4= combo5.getSelectedItem().toString();
            price = 350.0;
            qty = Integer.parseInt(dtf.getText());
            
             if(mes4.equals("KG"))
          {
               cal = (qty * price) ; 
               model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();
               model.addRow(new Object[]
                {   
                dhall,
                 price,
                 qty,
                 cal
                });  
          }
             else
             {
              cal = (qty/1000 * price) ; 

              model = (DefaultTableModel)jTable.getModel();          
              model.addRow(new Object[]
            {
            
             dhall,
             price,
             qty,
             cal
            });        
             }
            
        } 
           for(double i=0; i <jTable.getRowCount(); i++)
        {
            sum = sum + Double.parseDouble(jTable.getValueAt((int) i, 3).toString()); 
        }
        
        txtbill.setText(Double.toString(sum));
        }
    }
